name: Computer Science
description: Introduce fundamental programming concepts and algorithms.

name: Geography
description: Study Earth's landscapes, environments, and the relationships between people and their environments.

name: World History
description: Explore historical events, figures, and civilizations.

name: Language Learning
description: Focus on building vocabulary and language proficiency.

name: Art and Design
description: Explore artistic techniques, styles, and movements.

name: Medical Science
description: Study anatomy, physiology, and medical terminology.

name: Economics
description: Understand economic principles, theories, and policies.

name: Environmental Studies
description: Learn about ecosystems, conservation, and sustainability.

name: Psychology
description: Explore human behavior, cognition, and mental processes.
